name: INBooleanResolutionResult
desc: A resolution result for a Boolean value associated with an intent.

items.name: class func success(with: Bool) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified value.

items.name: static func confirmationRequired(with: Bool?) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.
